""" Module for User Schema """

from pydantic import BaseModel



[docs]class UserInfoBase(BaseModel):
    """Class UserInfoBase"""

    name: str
    email: str




[docs]class UserCreate(UserInfoBase):
    """
    Class UserCreate
    Use it during creation
    """

    password: str




[docs]class UserInfo(UserInfoBase):
    """
    Class UserInfo
    Use it during retrieving information
    """

    user_id: int


[docs]    class Config:
        """Config"""

        orm_mode = True




[docs]class UserInfoAdmin(UserInfoBase):
    """Class UserInfoAdmin"""

    user_id: int
    admin: bool
